  • Method Details

    • getExamContentAsTeacher

      Exam getExamContentAsTeacher(String classname)
      Retrieves the exam content for a specified class when accessed by a teacher.
      Parameters:
      classname - The name of the class for which the exam content is requested.
      Returns:
      An Exam object containing the exam content for the specified class, or null if not found.

    • getExamContentAsStudent

      Exam getExamContentAsStudent(String classname, List<String> authorityList)
      Retrieves the exam content for a specified class when accessed by a student. This method checks if the student has the required authority to access the exam content for the given class. Also checks if the current time falls within the allowed exam time range.
      Parameters:
      classname - The name of the class for which the exam content is requested.
      authorityList - A list of authorities associated with the student, used for access control.
      Returns:
      An Exam object containing the exam content if the student has access rights and the current time is within the exam time range; otherwise, returns null.

    • cacheExamContent

      void cacheExamContent(Exam exam)
